What were the first official English-translated anime and manga? There is a previous question about the first anime and manga ever, but I was wondering when the English-speaking world got introduced to the world of anime and manga. 
There were comics in the English-speaking world for ages, but at what point did we decide to try out the comics in the East?

Which was the first anime to receive a English dub? With this question and this question both receiving some attention recently, it made me think - which anime was the first to receive a dub?
Some of the first anime available in western countries such as Astro Boy had dubs produced in the 1960's as stated in the linked wikipedia article, but which show was the original one to have an officially produced English dub?
